column3: dɛm na akasa

column2: "Nkyii so EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ me wɔ ɔhen Josia ne nda no mu dɛ
column3: Ana ehu dza okyirsamfo Israel ayɛ yi? Ɔakɔ bepɔw sorɔnsorɔm biara do
column4: nye dua ebun ebun biara ase akɔgor ndwamangor."

column4: Ɔbɛsan aba me nkyɛn ara: naaso ɔnodze ɔannsan: na n'akyerɛbaa ɔkɔnkɔnsanyi Juda so hunii."

column2: "Ohun dɛ osian awar a okyirsannyi Israel ato no ntsi
column3: na megyaa no awar na mama no awarko nwoma no
column4: naaso na n'akyerɛbaa ɔkɔnkɔnsanyi Juda ennsuro; na mbom no so kɔree kɔgoor ndwamangor."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ osian no ndwamangor ne nka ntsi
column3: na asaase no ho guu fi

column2: "Na enyitodze amen hɛn egyanom berɛ a ofir hɛn mbofrase no; hɔn nguankuw nye hɔn anantwikuw

column2: "Wɔmma yɛndeda famu wɔ hɛn enyito mu

column5: ofitsi hɛn mbofrase dze besi ndɛ da yi mpo: na yenntsie EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn ne ndze."
